task.title: Preparing the master host operating system

taskbody.prereq: Perform the steps in , before performing this procedure.
taskbody.context: Use this procedure to prepare a RHEL/CentOS host as a master host.

step.cmd: Log in to the candidate master host .
Install and configure the NTP package.

info.note: This procedure assumes the host has internet access. To install and configure NTP on a host that does not have internet access, see .

substep.cmd: Stop and disable chronyd, if present.

stepxmp.codeblock: test "$(systemctl is-active chronyd)" = "active" \ && systemctl stop chronyd && systemctl disable chronyd
yum makecache fast && yum install ntp

substep.cmd: Enable and start the ntpd service.

stepxmp.codeblock: systemctl enable ntpd && systemctl start ntpd
